ja525:5.2: parissaje → pārisajje ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | parīsaje (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:14.4: Tena ahaṃ → tenāhaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | tenamahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:16.3: Yaṃ me kucchipaṭisandhiṃ → maṃ kucchimatiṃ santiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:20.3: Kaṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemi → ghātemi km avajjhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | taṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemi (mr)
ja525:23.1: Mātucca → mātu ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed), rudantyā → rudatyā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:25.2: imināttho → ko nu me iminā attho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | ko nu me nattho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:28.3: Taṃ te dadāmi sabbampi → taṃ deva te dadāmi sabbampi (bj) | tan te dadāmi sabbaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:34.4: Andhabālā → atha bālā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:36.2: pubbakamhi ca → pupphakamhi ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | pupphakamhi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:53.1: kho → rājā kho (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja525:54.4: Rammaṃ hi → surammañhi (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr), sudassanaṃ → sudassanaṃ nāma (bj)
ja525:55.3: Agacchittha → atha gañchittha (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | atha gacchittha (sya1ed, sya2ed)
